title: Council Regulation (EC) No 547/96 of 28 March 1996 repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1038/79 on Community support for a hydrocarbon exploration project in Greenland
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 547/96 of 28 March 1996 repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1038/79 on Community support for a hydrocarbon exploration project in Greenland
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 March 1996.
For the Council
The President
A. CLO
(1) OJ No C 17, 22. 1. 1996.
(2) OJ No C 18, 22. 1. 1996, p. 103.
(3) OJ No L 132, 30. 5. 1979, p. 1.
